column4: what will convert a  avi file to one that can be played on cellphone running android ?
my android phone can play most anything i toss at it - with the right player.. there are converteres out.. winff with the right presets works well. arista   also works well
the main trick is to realize the 'default' video player for android is a bit limited. :) moboplayer,  i find can play most everything.
winff has presets i use all the time.. 1/2 hr show = 30mb or so..  but dont expect the video it makes to look good on anything except the phone.
